span.style: font-size: 13px; font-size: 36px;
span.br:
The Technology Department is moving to a help desk
model to decrease exposure of its employees.
If you have an issue with a UCSD device, please call us
between 8 am and 2 pm Monday-Thursday.
The phone number to call is 864-427-2328.
We will no longer have scheduled office hours to
work on issues.

span.style: font-size: 32px;
text-decoration: underline;
font-size: 28px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
text-decoration: underline;
font-size: 20px;
span.br:
Media Release 3-24-20 As a result of the Governor’s executive order all South Carolina schools, including Union County Schools, will be closed until April 30, 2020. Your child’s health and well-being continue to remain our top priority. We will continue to provide lunches at our schools and on bus routes for anyone 18 years of age or younger. Our teachers have done a wonderful job transitioning to e-learning and will continue to provide educational opportunities for students to complete at home. Those educational opportunities will be online unless a student does not have access to technology. For those students we will continue to provide printed copies of assignments to be completed and returned to the teacher.
Our school buildings and offices will continue to stay closed to the public. However, our Technology department will continue to check out laptops and make repairs between 8am -11am, Monday-Thursday at 120 Lakeside Drive. Please continue to communicate with your student’s teachers and principal as we continue to work through these unprecedented times. Thank you for all that you are doing to help support our students and our schools.
I am reminded of a quote from NFL Coach Pete Carroll, “It comes down to taking care of the people in your organization and making them the best they can be – not giving up on them and never failing to be there for them.” We each are a part of this organization – we are One Union!

a.title: Resources

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-size: 26px;

a.span:
Union County Schools will be closed through April 30 to
prevent the spread of the Coronavirus

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-size: 26px;

a.span: (COVID 19). Updates regarding online learning and support for students will be sent to parents and

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-size: 26px;

a.span: students through email, phone calls, UCSD Facebook and posted at www.union.k12.sc.us.

Thank you for allowing us to serve you!

font-size: 22px;

br.a: Click here to access Union County's eLearning instructional resources

span.style: font-size: 32px;

strong.br:
Below you will find the link to the Returning Student Online Registration for the 2019-2020 School Year. This link is for any student who has previously been enrolled at ANY Union County School. You should have received a registration letter containing a SNAPCODE. Please follow this link and enter the SNAPCODE to register your student(s).
Returning Student Registration
New Student Registration
Below you will find a link for NEW Union County Schools students. Please only use this link if your student has never been in Union County Schools before. If your student is moving from one Union County School to another please use the Returning Student Registration above. The link below is only for NEW students.
